Topic.Title: End a game + Stats direct link

Posts.EditableText:
How do I end a game? Does it simply end at one page that has no link to go to... Or is there a way to end it in programation?

Also, I like to send the link so people can play directly the game, it opens in one click. But I realised that these players doesn't count in my statistics... It's like they had never played... Can I do something about that, except sending the link from textadentures?

Thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
Oddly enough...
finish
In the UI, if you select a script, End Game is an option...
But a room with no exits also forces the player to select End Game from the menu bar.
